document_data.mainbody:
Molars Artful Armourer and Molars Very Well-Equipped Voyager was a single blacksmith shop of Skull Crag in the Storm Horn Mountains of Cormyr in the 14 century DR.
Molars Artful Armourer and Molars Very Well-Equipped Voyager were two shops with their doors right next to each other with the Voyager door to the south and the Armourer to the west. Each of the shops had a sign with its name, however, once a customer entered either door they quickly realized that both doors led to a single shop and to a single proprietor, a man named Molar.
In the mid-14 century DR, Molars was the only shop that traded in armor and weapons in Skull Crag, and was popular among the travelers of the High Road. Molars prices were high due to the monopoly in the village.
